TopicTitle: TU reflections seem way worse than other people's ?

Articles.Content: I recently installed TU and RVE64k in 1.7.3, however I soon came to find out that the reflections were off, as seen in this image (https://imgur.com/a/Yp9lTDI) it seems to be worse than others. This is my first experience with TU, I'm still figuring out how it works, I couldn't find any topics on this, nor could I find anything about it in the thread for TU.

4 hours ago, Cattette said:

Do you have Magpiemods installed? 

No, is this required?

Could be your graphics settings, specifically around reflection resolution. High res is good for looks, bad for performance so try the lowest setting first and if your FPS and game run speed are OK bump it up a notch and try again.

20 hours ago, GalacticEmporer said:

No, is this required?

It is required to give a lot of stock and modded parts reflections. TU does nothing on itself, it only allows parts to use more powerful materials. You need another mod that actually tells stuff to be reflective.
